UniprotID	Q9NR21

EntryName	PAR11_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein mono-ADP-ribosyltransferase PARP11 (EC 2.4.2.-) (ADP-ribosyltransferase diphtheria toxin-like 11) (ARTD11) (Poly [ADP-ribose] polymerase 11) (PARP-11)
GeneName	PARP11 C12orf6
Length	338
Function	Mono-ADP-ribosyltransferase that mediates mono-ADP-ribosylation of target proteins (PubMed:25043379, PubMed:25673562). Plays a role in nuclear envelope stability and nuclear remodeling during spermiogenesis (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Nuclear pore complex
